amendment.description: An amendment to reduce the National Railroad Passenger Corporation Office of Inspector General account by $4,800,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the National Railroad Passenger Corporation Office of Inspector General account by $4,800,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
